titles.title: Federal Election Integrity Act of 2009
To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit certain State election administration officials from actively participating in electoral campaigns.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E84)
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
1/14/2009--Introduced.
Federal Election Integrity Act of 2009 - Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to make it unlawful for a chief state election administration official to take active part in political management or in a political campaign with respect to any election for federal office over which the official has supervisory authority.
